alert.note: Alert for Benson; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 9:57PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benson, Towner and west central Ramsey Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 957 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Overly to near Fillmore to near Harvey. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cando, Leeds, Maddock, Minnewaukan, Bisbee, Rocklake and Esmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for northeastern North Dakota.
